channel.title: Posts on Renzo C. Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Renzo C. Silva

item.title: Research data management & "good enough" practices
item.description: Why this post? This post is inspired by the nice (open access!) work of Wilson et al. (2017), in which a set of good enough practices in scientific computing is laid down. Here I build on a subset of topics presented there, discuss a few key points, suggest external resources, and share personal experiences for those that have recognized the importance of changing their habits of research data management, but have not taken their first step in this journey.

item.title: A personal website is born!
item.description: RIGHT ON TIME! I’ve been thinking about having a personal website for quite a while. Somewhere to host personal and professional ideas/experiences - aka brain dump - that may deserve a dedicated outlet. If the material to be presented here becomes somewhat useful to other folks, then I’ll be closer to my main goal of contributing back to this lively community (Note: It is hard to pinpoint one specific theme I’ve been tapping knowledge from, e.
